entry.title: WIND WARNING , North Cape
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cape 07:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: E 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning then changing to rain near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this morning then to 60 gusting to 100 near noon. High 8. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Showers ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
